entry.title: $2550 // ☻☻☻ LOOKING for Park Slope 1 Bedroom? NO FEE
entry.content:
This full 1 bedroom located in the heart of Park Slope is ready. It consists of a Full Bedroom (2 windows), Kitchen with window and lots of cabinets, Living Room (2 windows), Bathroom (window) and 3 closets. The apartment was previously renovated including kitchen. The kitchen renovation included abundant wood cabinets, appliances (including dishwasher) and ceramic tile floor. Nice hardwood floors. Rent includes heat and hot water.

Located on a beautiful tree lined block with Prospect Park just 3 blocks. Great restaurants and wonderful shopping are just a block away. NO FEE. IMMEDIATE Occupancy. Call show contact info.

entry.title: $2600 // Tree-lined Park Slope - Centrally Located (Atlantic Terminal) NO FEE
entry.content:
Top floor of a townhouse on this tree-lined Park Slope street. Two bedroom apartment with living room and kitchen/dining area. Hardwood floors throughout. Space for bike storage in stairwell landing. No broker fee. FiOS or Spectrum internet available up to 1 Gbps.

This apartment is around the corner from Bergen St. stop, and less than a 10 min walk to Atlantic Terminal -- which puts you very close to tons of subway lines (B, Q, 2, 3, 4, 5, D, N, and R). Right around the corner from Hungry Ghost, Artichoke Pizza, and plenty of other restaurants and bars.

We'll be holding an open house on Sunday (8/5) from 11am to 2pm. Email for details if you're interested.
